'''Star Wars Prequel Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Mcnet|star-wars-sequel-skin-pack-out-now|Star Wars Prequel Skin Pack: Out Now|March 31, 2018|Marsh Davies}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that includes 53 skins of characters from ''{{W|Star Wars: The Force Awakens|Star Wars: Episode VII – The Force Awakens}}'' and ''{{W|Star Wars: The Last Jedi|Star Wars: Episode VIII – The Last Jedi}}'', the first two movies in the {{W|Star Wars sequel trilogy|''Star Wars'' sequel trilogy}}.
